TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEnumerable

summary.span: 公開能逐一查看非泛型集合內容一次的列舉程式。

span.span: Exposes an enumerator, which supports a simple iteration over a non-generic collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是可列舉的所有非泛型集合的基底介面。 is the base interface for all non-generic collections that can be enumerated. 此介面的泛型版本，請參閱。For the generic version of this interface see . 包含單一方法，以傳回。 contains a single method, , which returns an . 讓您能夠藉由公開逐一查看集合屬性和和方法。 provides the ability to iterate through the collection by exposing a property and and methods. 實作最佳的作法是並在您的集合類別，以啟用`foreach`(`For Each` Visual Basic 中) 語法，但是實作不需要。It is a best practice to implement and on your collection classes to enable the `foreach` (`For Each` in Visual Basic) syntax, however implementing is not required. 如果您的集合不會實作，您仍然必須遵循以支援此語法所提供的迭代器模式`GetEnumerator`傳回的介面、 類別或結構的方法。If your collection does not implement , you must still follow the iterator pattern to support this syntax by providing a `GetEnumerator` method that returns an interface, class or struct. 當使用 Visual Basic，您必須提供實作，這由`GetEnumerator`。When using Visual Basic, you must provide an implementation, which is returned by `GetEnumerator`. 使用 C# 開發必須時提供類別，其中包含`Current`屬性，並`MoveNext`並`Reset`所述的方法，但類別沒有實作。When developing with C# you must provide a class that contains a `Current` property, and `MoveNext` and `Reset` methods as described by , but the class does not have to implement . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何逐一查看所實作的自訂集合的最佳做法和介面。The following code example demonstrates the best practice for iterating a custom collection by implementing the and interfaces. 在此範例中，這些介面的成員不會明確呼叫，但它們會實作以支援使用`foreach`(`For Each` Visual Basic 中) 來逐一查看集合。In this example, members of these interfaces are not explicitly called, but they are implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`For Each` in Visual Basic) to iterate through the collection. 這個範例是完整的主控台應用程式。This example is a complete Console app. 若要編譯 Visual Basic 應用程式，變更**啟始物件**要**Sub Main**在專案的**屬性**頁面。To compile the Visual Basic app, change the **Startup object** to **Sub Main** in the project’s **Properties** page. 如需範例，示範如何實作介面，請參閱[集合類別中實作 IEnumerable 介面](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Implementing-the-e1708a24)For a sample that shows how to implement the interface, see [Implementing the IEnumerable Interface in a Collection Class](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Implementing-the-e1708a24) [!code-csharp[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/cs/ienumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/vb/ienumerator.vb#1)]

集合類別中實作 IEnumerable 介面

span.span: Implementing the IEnumerable Interface in a Collection Class

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: 傳回逐一查看集合的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.

returns.span: 物件，可用於逐一查看集合。

span.span: An object that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 語言的 `foreach` 陳述式 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `For Each`) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 方法也會列舉值帶回至這個位置。The method also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在這個位置，未定義屬性。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，您必須呼叫列舉值前進到第一個項目，再讀取的值集合的方法。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 或 。 returns the same object until either or is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫會傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returns `false`, is undefined. 若要再次將 設定為集合的第一個元素，您可以在呼叫 之後，接著呼叫 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 如果變更的集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉值的行為是未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the behavior of the enumerator is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範實作介面之自訂集合。The following code example demonstrates the implementation of the interfaces for a custom collection. 在此範例中，不會明確呼叫，但它實作為支援使用`foreach`(`For Each` Visual Basic 中)。In this example, is not explicitly called, but it is implemented to support the use of `foreach` (`For Each` in Visual Basic). 這個程式碼範例是針對較大範例的一部分介面。This code example is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/cs/ienumerator.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections_EnumeratorInterfaces/vb/ienumerator.vb#1)]
